item.description:
Another great show is happening the Hard Rock Cafe This Thurs (Aug 26). This is the last show in the New England Americana Festival summer series and features a great line-up.

Dennis Brennan, Tripping Lily, Brown Bird, John Colvert, Highway Ghosts, Rationales, Kingsley Flood

I'm a big fan of Brown Bird, Dennis Brennan and Kingsley Flood (who were just featured on NPR).

More info at http://www.newengland...

Follow on twitter and Facebook for news on upcoming shows.

http://www.facebook.c...
http://www.twitter.co...

Here's the set times (from NEAF, not me):

7:00 - 7:45 The Rationales
7:45 - 8:20 Tripping Lily
8:30 - 9:10 John Colvert
9:20 - 10:05 Brown Bird
10:15 - 11:15 Dennis Brennan Quatro
11:25 - 12:00 Highway Ghosts
12:10 - 12:45 Kingsley Flood
item.how_to_find_us: I'll probably be there 9ish. Will email cell# to attendees or ask for "Jeff from NH" at the door.
item.name: NEAF show at Hard Rock TONIGHT
